title: Website conversion rate dropped 15% this week
suggestedAction: Check checkout flow and recent site changes immediately.

title: Customer support tickets increased 40% for Product B
suggestedAction: Investigate Product B quality issues and prepare FAQ update.

title: Email open rates improving after subject line A/B test
suggestedAction: Apply winning subject line format to all campaigns.

title: Competitor launched similar product at 20% lower price
suggestedAction: Review pricing strategy and highlight unique value propositions.

title: Social media engagement down 25% since algorithm change
suggestedAction: Adapt content strategy for new Instagram algorithm requirements.

title: Return rate for SKU-C45 exceeds 12% threshold
suggestedAction: Halt SKU-C45 production and investigate manufacturing defects.

title: New supplier offering 15% cost reduction on materials
suggestedAction: Schedule quality assessment meeting with new supplier next week.

title: Mobile app crash rate increased to 3.2% after latest update
suggestedAction: Rollback app update and investigate crash logs immediately.

title: Seasonal demand pattern suggests inventory surge needed
suggestedAction: Increase inventory by 30% for back-to-school season.

title: Positive sentiment spike after influencer partnership announcement
suggestedAction: Amplify partnership content across all marketing channels.
